title: Ep 383 | Why Atheists Believe in Miracles & Phil’s Fatherly Hunting Advice to Jase
description:
Jase recalls some good advice Phil gave him about deer hunting. Tony Perkins, president of the Family Research Council and host of “Washington Watch,” joins the guys to talk about how Jesus and politics mix. Phil remembers a time when there were no deer in Louisiana. Tony and Al discuss what happens when the government attempts to address climate change. Phil explains why even atheists believe in miracles. And Jase points out that the Bible reminds people to do things that feel uncomfortable to get out there and share the Word.
